column1: Two best friends lived in a small town. They grew up together and did everythingtogether. One boy was named @entity0, and he was a cute, fat kid who was always pickedon. And then the other boy was named @entity1, and he was handsome and cool. They wereopposites, but they did not care. @entity1 would always protect @entity0 from the bullies because@entity0 was weak.One day, @entity0 was being teased by the bullies, @entity2 and @entity3, but @entity1 was not thereto save him. @entity0 did not know what to do and was scared. But then he remembered all ofthe times @entity1 stood up for him. @entity0 looked up to @entity1 and he thought of him as hishero. @entity0 wanted to protect himself and not have @entity1 always come to help. So this time,@entity0 got up and was brave. He stood up to @entity2 and @entity3 and told them that he was notscared. The bullies did not know what to do and then gave up. They went away to look formore fun things to do. @entity1 saw the whole thing and was proud of @entity0 for being brave.Now @entity0 and @entity1 protect each other and stand up for each other. They still are the bestof friends.
@placeholder did the bullies do after @entity0 stood up to them
the bullies did not know what to do and gave up. they went away to look for more fun things.
